front.title: Ingress Traffic Engineering Considerations in LISP Networks

abstract.t: EID-to-RLOC (Endpoint Identifier to Routing Locators) mapping system is one of the cornerstones for LISP (Location/Identifier Separation Protocol) networks. This document discusses one solution to support ingress traffic engineering by controlling the EID-to-RLOC mappings in LISP networks as response to dynamic network status.
